title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Fry pancetta/bacon with garlic until crispy.
Beat eggs with Parmesan, salt, and pepper.
Drain pasta and mix quickly with egg mixture and pancetta.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice for 1 hour.
Grill or fry chicken until cooked.
Sauté onion and garlic in oil until golden.
Add tomato puree and simmer 10 minutes.
Add cooked chicken and cream, cook 5 more minutes.
Serve with rice or naan.

title: Vegetable Stir Fry
summary: A quick and healthy stir-fried mix of vegetables with soy sauce and sesame oil.
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok.
Add garlic and ginger, sauté 1 minute.
Add vegetables and stir fry for 5–7 minutes.
Add soy sauce and cook 2 more minutes.
Serve hot with rice or noodles.

title: Classic Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with fresh lettuce, tomato, and melted cheese on a toasted bun.
instructions: Form beef into 4 patties, season with salt and pepper.
Grill or fry patties until cooked to preference.
Toast buns lightly.
Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, patty, and cheese.
Serve with fries or salad.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Traditional Italian pizza topped with fresh mozzarella, basil, and tomato sauce.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C.
Spread tomato sauce on the dough.
Top with mozzarella and basil leaves.
Drizzle olive oil and sprinkle salt.
Bake for 12–15 minutes until crust is golden.
Serve hot.

title: Sushi Platter
summary: A selection of fresh sushi rolls with salmon, tuna, and avocado.
instructions: Cook sushi rice and season with rice vinegar.
Place nori on bamboo mat, spread rice evenly.
Add fillings (salmon, tuna, avocado).
Roll tightly and slice.
Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake topped with creamy chocolate ganache.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix flour, sugar, cocoa, eggs, milk, and butter until smooth.
Pour into a greased baking pan.
Bake for 25–30 minutes.
Cool and top with chocolate ganache.
Serve slices.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce with creamy Caesar dressing, croutons, and parmesan cheese.
instructions: Wash and chop lettuce.
Toss lettuce with Caesar dressing.
Add croutons and sprinkle parmesan.
Season with salt and pepper.
Serve immediately.
